ai-atk-s0404a30:1_0: Then he reveals the first group of people, holding the second absorption, which is consistent for all around, and all is
ai-atk-s0404a30:2_0: The Visākha are running errands and messages for the Nuns
ai-atk-s0404a30:3_0: The Book of the Tens is finished.
ai-atk-s0404a30:4_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
